## Load packages

```{r}
pacman::p_load(jsonlite, tidyverse)
```

## Load data

In the code chunk below, `fromJSON()` of **jsonlite** package is used to import the JSON files into R environment:

```{r}
mc1_data <- fromJSON("data/mc1.json")
```

```{r}
mc2_data <- fromJSON("data/mc2.json")
```

```{r}
mc3_data <- fromJSON("data/mc3-v1.json")
```
